books.title: The Quran
books.author: Allah
books.description: The holy book of Islam, considered by Muslims to be a revelation from Allah (God) to the Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him).

books.title: Sahih al-Bukhari
books.author: Imam al-Bukhari
books.description: A collection of hadiths (sayings and actions of the Prophet Muhammad) compiled by Imam al-Bukhari, one of the most trusted and authentic sources of hadith in Sunni Islam.

books.title: The Sealed Nectar
books.author: Safiur Rahman Mubarakpuri
books.description: A biography of the Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him) that provides an in-depth account of his life, teachings, and the early history of Islam.
